name: Tetromino Barge Company
description:
Note: Please excuse the debug build for now, I had last-minute problems with the release version. I haven't found any crashes since switching back, but if there are, you can use the level select screen to get back to where you were last.

Tetromino Barge Company:

You are a newly hired barge-delivery person who is needed by their company to recover from an ambiguous disaster which left barge pieces scattered on the river. Use your boat and your crane to capture and rearrange the tetrominos into the vague barge shapes and make your manager, Ms. Boss, proud!

Controls:

Left Mouse: Drag piece
Mouse Wheel: Rotate piece

Theme: "Stronger Together"

Made using Godot v3.2.3

Licensed Assets:

Dogica Font
https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font

with Reserved Font Name Dogica Pixel.
